alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 14 at 10:45AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Extremely Critical Fire Weather Conditions Wednesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074... 075...084 AND 085... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM CST WEDNESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 074...075...084 AND 085... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton... Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant...Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton and Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens. * Winds...Today southwest winds at 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 35 mph possible. Wednesday the winds will be southwest 40 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent Today and Wednesday. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised. On Wednesday given the magnitude of forecast winds and low relative humidity, spot fires can develop, making fire fighting efforts extremely challenging.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
